message.content: {"id": "124067", "title": "When selecting an XML file, the software should support relative paths", "description": "When selecting an XML file, the software currently only supports absolute file paths. The expected behavior is for the software to also support relative file paths.", "OB": "When I select an XML file, the software only accepts absolute file paths. Instead, it should also allow me to use relative file paths.", "EB": "", "SR": "Update the software to support relative file paths when selecting an XML file."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124067', 'title': 'Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported.', 'description': 'Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported.
